name.description: The name of the query parameter.

value.description: The value of the query parameter.

outPath.description: The path where the downloaded file will be saved.

allowOverwrite.description: Whether to allow overwriting an existing file at the specified path. If false and the file exists, the download will fail.

headers.description: Headers to include in the HTTP request.

queryParams.description: Query parameters to include in the HTTP request.

insecureSkipTLSVerify.description: Whether to skip TLS verification when making the request. (Not recommended.)

timeout.description: The maximum time to wait for the download to complete. If not specified, the default is 5 minutes.
